title: Long Hot Summer: The Complete Collection
description:
A touring rockstar and a mobster on vacation.

A secret beach and a mysterious man at the pool.


The Long Hot Summer collection contains four short and steamy instalove stories, all scorching hot for those late summer nights.

Grab an ice cold cocktail and settle in for:


Pool Girl

Every night, I float on the pool.And every night, he watches me.
Beach Baby

The secret beach is my happy place.Until the handsome developer threatens to ruin it all.
Hot Spring Kingpin

I’m a king of the underworld. A criminal titan.She’s an ice cream seller with freckles.
With The Band

After walking for hours through the desert, I’m ready to give up on hitchhiking.Then I’m picked up by a rock star.
author: Cassie Mint
